title: MOOC Education Quality Assessment and Design Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Educational design integrating quality assessment methodologies for language learning MOOCs in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments with simulation/VR

learning_goals: Explain the five core criteria for evaluating MOOC quality: structural integrity, clarity, interactivity, personalized support, and technological appropriateness
Design learner support tools (feedback systems, progress tracking) in VR simulation environments and propose applicable implementation plans
Develop actual MOOC scenarios utilizing principles of mobile-optimized educational content design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
